item.name: Mud Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Mud Crystals found near Glish Ruins.

item.name: Melted Platinum Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Platinum Ore.

item.name: Powder of Flame
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: There’s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Metal Solvent
item.desc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
